brief: This command adds a new class to the existing server configuration.
cmd-comment: The ``next-server``, ``server-hostname``, and ``boot-file-name`` are DHCPv4-specific. Only one client class can be added with a single command.
cmd-syntax: "test": <test expression to be evaluated on incoming packets>,
name: class-add
resp-comment: The command is successful (result 0), unless the class name is a duplicate or another error occurs (result 1).
